title: Modern Website Development with React & Tailwind CSS
description: Responsive interface showcasing background, skills and projects. Contact form and interactive animations integrated.

title: Conditional Variational Autoencoder (cVAE) for Image Generation
description: Training on the CelebA dataset and generating images conditioned by visual attributes using a cVAE architecture in PyTorch.

title: Pizza Image Classification System
description: Extraction of color & texture descriptors, shape detection (Hough). Implementation and comparison of KNN, SVM and GMM models.

title: Java Curling Game
description: Desktop Java application packaged with Maven, real-time webcam input and multithreaded processing. Homography calibration and vision pipeline, game engine managing turns & scoring.
